title: Fardaws Aimaq commits to Texas Tech while still mulling NBA draft - ESPN
content:
1. Fardaws Aimaq commits to Texas Tech while still mulling NBA draft  ESPN
  2. Fardaws Aimaq Passes on UW for Texas Tech  Sports Illustrated
  3. Fardaws Aimaq announces transfer to Texas Tech basketball, mulls NBA Draft prospects  LubbockOnline.com
  4. Texas Tech basketball: Red Raiders land transfer Fardaws Aimaq  Wreck 'em Red
  5. Utah Valley transfer C Fardaws Aimaq commits to Texas Tech over Texas, others  Burnt Orange Nation
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Utah Valley transfer Fardaws Aimaq, the 2021 WAC Player of the Year who is still considering staying in the NBA draft, has committed to Texas Tech if he returns to college basketball.
